thread.section_title: Boro Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Long Island City, New York) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice Low key Hotel
thread.title_full: Nice Low key Hotel - Review of Boro Hotel, Long Island City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Lee F
title: Nice Low key Hotel
text: I stayed here back in August 2016. This hotel was up to date, clean, and had great customer service. The hotel grounds were pretty spacious (roof top, lobby, balconies.) Breakfast was really good and had a fair selection on the menu. The rooms could be a little more spacious and it would have been nice to have some more storage areas for our belongings, bathroom was huge, the king size beds were extremely comfortable, and the view from our bed was amazing! Great stay, location, and reasonably priced. I highly recommend staying here if visiting NY.
